definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: put on (a garment), wear, clothe, be clothed (NH id.; Aram. [[לָבֵישׁ]], lbe4; As. labâšu; Ar.labisa ; Eth. labsa:);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[לָבֵשׁ]] Ps 93:1, Ps 93:1, [[לָבַשׁ]] Job 7:5 + 2 t., [[וְלָבַשׁ]] (consec.) Le 6:3 + 3 t.; sf. [[וּלְבָשֵׁם]] (consec.) Le 16:4; 3 fs. [[לָֽבְשָׁה]] Ju Jdg 6:34 + 2 t., etc. (Ez Eze 42:14 rd. prob. [[וְלָֽבְשׁוּ]] Qr, for [[ילבשׁו]] Kt, but cl. perhaps interpol., v. Co); Impf. 3 ms. [[יִלְבַּשׁ]] De 22:5 +; sf. [[וַיִּלְבָּשֵׁנִי]] Job 29:14 [[יִלְבָּשָׁם]] Ex 29:30; 1 s. sf. [[אֶלְבָּשֶָׁנָּה]] Ct So 5:3; 3 fpl. [[תִּלְבַּשְׁןָ]] 2Sa 13:18, etc.; Imv. ms. [[לְבַשׁ]] 1Ki 22:30, etc.;Inf. abs. [[לָבוֹשׁ]] Hag 1:6; cstr. [[לִלְבּשׁ]] Ge 28:20, Le 21:10;  Pt. act. pl. [[הַלּֽבְשִׁים]] Zep 1:8; pass. abs. [[לָבוּשׁ]] 1Sa 17:5, Da 10:5; [[לָבֻשׁ]] Ez Eze 9:2 + 3 t.; cstr. [[לְבוּשׁ]] Da 12:6, Da 12:7, [[לְבֻשׁ]] Ez Eze 9:11 + 3 t.; pl. cstr. [[לְבֻשֵׁי]] Ez Eze 23:6 + 2 t.;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: lit. put on (one's own) garment (acc.) Ge 38:19, 1Sa 28:8, 2Sa 14:2, 1Ki 22:30 = 2Ch 18:29, Ex 29:30, Le 6:3, Le 6:4, Le 16:4, Le 16:4, Le 16:23, Le 16:24, Le 16:32, Le 21:10, De 22:5, Ez Eze 44:17, Eze 44:19, and so Eze 42:14 Qr (v. supr.), Jon 3:5, Ct So 5:3, Es 4:1, Es 5:1; c. acc. garment + [[עַל־בְּשָׂרוֹ]] Le 16:3; of putting on armour Je 46:4; = wear (more or less habitually), c. acc. of garment, Is 4:1, De 22:11, Zep 1:8, Zec 13:4; of Jerus. under fig. of woman Je 4:30, of rulers under fig. of shepherds Ez Eze 34:3, cf. [[כֵּן תִּלְבַּשְׁןָ]] 2Sa 13:18 (no acc.)

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: very oft. fig., put on, be clothed with, c. acc. of garment;—[[לָבַשׁ בְּשָׂרִי רִמָּה]] Job 7:5 my flesh is clothed (i.e. covered) with worms; of Jerus., be clothed with inhabitants Is 49:18; of pasture, with flocks Ps 65:14; more oft. the garment is some abstract quality, e.g. righteousness, majesty, beauty, strength, etc.;—[[וַיִּלְבַּשׁ חְדָקָה כַּשִּׁרְיׇן]] Is 59:17 he (´[[י]]) hath put on righteousness as a breastplate, cf. v:Is 59:17 (vengeance), Ps 93:1 (majesty), v:Ps 93:1 (strength), Ps 104:1 (honour and majesty), Is 51:9 (strength); also Job 40:10; said of men, 2Ch 6:41 (salvation), Ps 132:9 (righteousness), Job 29:14 (id.); of Zion Is 52:1, Is 52:1; also in bad sense, clothed with terror, trembling, shame, etc., Ez Eze 7:27, Eze 26:16, Job 8:22, Ps 35:26, Ps 109:29, cf. v:Ps 109:18 (cursing).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: lit. put on, obj. om., [[בֶּגֶד לִלְבּשׁ]]…[[נׇתַן]] Ge 28:20, Job 27:17; Inf. abs. [[לָבוֹשׁ]] Hag 1:6 (there is) a clothing, but he has nothing for warmth.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: Pt. pass., clothed with, chiefly Ezek.;—c. acc. of garment, Ez Eze 9:2, Eze 9:3, Zec 3:3, Pr 31:21, Da 10:5; of wearing armour 1Sa 17:5; cstr. before garment, [[לְבֻשׁ הַבַּדִּים]] Ez Eze 9:11, Eze 10:2, Eze 10:6, Eze 10:7, cf. Eze 23:6, Eze 23:12, Eze 38:4, Da 12:6, Da 12:7.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: fig.:—[[לָֽבְשָׁה אֶת־גִּדְעָוֹן]] ´[[וְרוּחַ י]] Ju Jdg 6:34 and the spirit of  ´[[י]] clothed itself with Gideon, i.e. (GFM) took possession of him (cf. labiy4 possessed); so 1Ch 12:18, 2Ch 24:20; [[חֶדֶק לָבַשְׁתִּי וַיִּלְבָּשֵׁנִי]] Job 29:14 and it clothed itself in me, as it were, became incarnate in me.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: only Pt. pl. [[מְלֻבָּשִׁים]] arrayed, c. acc. of garment 1Ki 22:10 = 2Ch 18:9, 2Ch 5:12; abs. in full apparel Ezr 3:10.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[הִלְבִּישַׁנִי]] Is 61:10; 3 fs. [[הִלְבִּישָׁה]] Ge 27:16; 2ms. [[וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֫]] Ex 28:41 + 3 t.; sf. [[וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּם]] (consec.) Ex 29:8, Nu 20:26; 1 s. sf. [[וְהִלְבַּשְׁתִּיו]] Is 22:21; 3 pl. [[הִלְבִּישׁוּ]] 2Ch 28:15, [[וְהִלְבִּשׁוּ]] (consec.) Es 6:9; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיַּלְבֵּשׁ]] Ge 41:42 + 5 t.; sf. [[וַיַּלְבִּשֵׁם]] Ge 3:21, Le 8:13; 3 fs. [[תַּלְבִּישׁ]] Pr 23:21, etc.; Inf. abs. [[הַלְבֵּשׁ]] Zec 3:4; cstr. [[הַלְבִּישׁ]] Es 4:4; Pt. sf. [[הַמַּלְבִּֽשְׁכֶם]] 1Sa 1:24; —clothe, array with.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit. [[וַיּלְבֵּשׁ אׂתוֹ בִּגְדֵי־שֵׁשׁ]] Ge 41:42, 2Sa 1:24, Is 22:21, Ex 28:41, Ex 29:5, Ex 29:8, Ex 40:13, Ex 40:14, Le 8:7, Le 8:13, Nu 20:26, Nu 20:28, Zec 3:4, Zec 3:5; of clothing Jerus. under fig. of infant Ez Eze 16:10; of putting armour on some one 1Sa 17:38, 1Sa 17:38.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig., Job 10:11 thou hast clothed me with skin and flesh; cf. Job 39:19 (quivering of horse's neck); Is 50:3, Is 61:10, Ps 132:16, Ps 132:18.
c. acc. garment only, Ge 27:16 ( + [[עַל־יׇדָיו]]); fig., Pr 23:21.
